snippet.title: Ekka fun right in your backyard
snippet.content: IF YOU love the Ekka but don't want to travel then look no further than your own backyard. The popular three-day Springfield Mini Show Day event will once again be held at Robelle Domain Parklands next month and will feature cheap rides, show bags and entertainment. The family event was first held last year and was attended by hundreds of people, with this year's event expected to draw an even larger crowd. With all amusement rides priced at $2 the event has been dubbed the affordable alternative to the Royal Brisbane Show and will also feature sideshow alley games, market stalls and food vans. The Springfield Mini Show Day will be held at Robelle Domain Parklands from August 11-13. The Springfield Mini Show Day is hosted by the Riverview Community Centre and will run from Friday August 11 through to Sunday August 13 at the Pyramid Lawn, Robelle Domain Parklands, Springfield. Run times for the event are as follows: Friday 11th August 2017: 11am - 3pm Tiny Tots Under 5s Mini Show Day, All kids rides just $1 Each, (Kids rides only open) That's crazy pricing (11am-3pm 11/08/17 only) Then 3pm - 6pm All rides open Springfield Mini Show Day Family fun with all rides Just $2 each Saturday 12th August 2017: 10am - 8pm Springfield Mini Show Day Family fun with all rides Just $2 each. Sunday 13th August 2017: 10am - 4pm Springfield Mini Show Day Family fun with all rides Just $2 each
